# Review Findings

FAIL

1. location: docs/policies/access-control.md#Access Review
   issue: Missing explicit quarterly review cadence for delegated access.
   fix: Add a quarterly access-right recertification control mapped to PR.AA.G1.

2. location: docs/policies/access-control.md#Privileged Access
   issue: PIM controls are advisory instead of mandatory for applicable scope.
   fix: Replace non-binding language with mandatory wording for PR.AA.G2 controls.
